template.subject: Request: Targeted Sanctions on Iranian Human Rights Violators
template.body:
Dear Sir or Madam,

I am writing to request that the U.S. Department of State take action to impose targeted sanctions on Iranian government officials responsible for the ongoing human rights crisis.

Since December 28, 2025, the Iranian government has:

• Killed over 51 peaceful protesters
• Detained more than 2,270 individuals
• Imposed a nationwide internet blackout
• Used lethal force against unarmed civilians

I urge the Department to:

1. Identify and designate officials responsible for ordering or carrying out violence against protesters under the Global Magnitsky Human Rights Accountability Act

2. Freeze assets and revoke visas of designated individuals

3. Coordinate with allied nations to implement similar measures

4. Publicly name those responsible to create a record of accountability

Targeted sanctions send a clear message that human rights violators will face consequences. This is not a time for silence.

Thank you for your attention to this urgent matter.

Sincerely,
A concerned citizen

variations.subject: Urgent: Magnitsky Act Sanctions for Iran Human Rights Abusers
variations.body:
Dear Sir or Madam,

I urge immediate action under the Global Magnitsky Act to sanction Iranian officials responsible for the violent crackdown on protesters.

The situation:
• 51+ killed since December 28, 2025
• 2,270+ detained
• Total internet blackout
• Documented use of live ammunition

Specific requests:
1. Identify and sanction commanders ordering violence
2. Freeze assets of designated officials
3. Coordinate with EU and other allies
4. Make designations public for accountability

America must stand for human rights. Please act.

Respectfully,
A concerned American
